name: Crispy Banana Cookies
author: Ruben Jerez
summary: These spiced banana cookies are crispy on the outside and soft in the inside.
ingredients: 4 ounces sun-dried bananas, cut into small pieces
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cream sugar and butter together in a medium bowl using an electric mixer until light and smooth
Mix in molasses, egg, and vanilla extract on high speed
Sift flour, baking powder, cinnamon, ginger, and nutmeg together in a separate bowl
Stir in sun-dried bananas using a wooden spoon
Shape dough into walnut-sized balls and place onto the prepared cookie sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are set and golden, 10 to 12 minutes
Remove from the oven and let cool for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
